summary: Adoptions in the Adopted Children Register: sex, and whether the adopted child born within/outside marriage
description: Data on adoptions are derived from the Adopted Children Register and are based on adoption orders made in England and Wales. The data here relates to those cases notified by the courts to the Registrar General and entered onto the Adopted Children Register in a given year.
title: Adoptions data collection
name: Adoptions data collection
